item.title: Atlassian - ITSM
item.author: androchentw@gmail.com (androchentw)
item.description: Overview Continuing previous post: Agile Life, let’s dive deeper into a series of ITSM methodologies and products proposed by Atlassian, with a view to applying them in work and life to further enhance productivity and narrative skills. Challenges Profile: Data Engineer + Operations Administrator Jobs Provisioning and troubleshooting data pipeline, visualization and monitoring Collaborate with other developers and administrators Pains Repeated or similar questions Long communication time to do situation
